response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line, high-value product to you. This unique offering has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This investment will undoubtedly pay off in terms of functionality, efficiency, and long-term benefits. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
